Name: Prism
About the game: Prism is a 2D puzzle game where you attempt to light up a set of colored targets with appropriately colored lasers. Use mirrors to reflect lasers, beam splitters to duplicate them, and splitfusors to combine primary colors into secondary, or split secondary colors into primaries.
